# Welcome to multiioâ€™s documentation!

# Install

```bash
sudo pip install multiio
```

or

```bash
sudo pip3 install multiio
```

# Update

```bash
sudo pip install multiio -U
```

or

```bash
sudo pip3 install multiio -U
```

$ python

Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>>
>>> multiio = m()
>>>
